Articles.Content:
Hey there! So I'm robly18 and I just got KSP. I've been hyped about it the whole week and today I finally got an opportunity to buy it and here I am!

As you can guess I've been playing a lot of the demo. I'd already landed on the mun but today I went further:I landed on minmus... And came back! Landed safely on an ocean, but quite near the coast. I'm quite proud of myself and I have a feeling I won't stop playing KSP sso soon...

Hi robly18, welcome to the community

Congratulations on your successful flight, may you have many more.
